name: Diamond Jones
overview: A Boulder Dash style game with an added wrinkle published in 64'er 1992/07 and in 64'er 1996/08. A dangerous adventure awaits Diamond Jones: Driven by greed, he or she tries to collect the scattered diamonds in caves that are in danger of collapsing. Not enough that the poorly supported caves only stand for 40 seconds each. before they collapse, in addition, a few of them will make you crazy! Boulders that have become difficult to create. There's only one thing to do: get to the joystick and the poor gold digger some diamonds so he can enjoy the easy life.
